title: Is Vlad x Ahri canon in academyverse/Academy Adventures comics?

embed.description: What does a day in the life of Academy Ahri, Darius, Ekko, and Vlad look like? Wonder no longer! We collaborated with Gutter Rat , a wickedly talented community creator, to bring the students' school shenanigans to life. We hope you enjoy Season 1 of Academy Adventures and for even more Academy fun check out Season 2 here !

body: Or are they just friends? Is she told-digging (Kindlejack mentioned he's the stereotypical rich kid)?

replies.body:
I imagined rich doesn't imply popular, if anything it makes it difficult for him to relate to the others (and then there's his habit of asking people their blood type before their name). Ahri would probably see benefit in having access to his house for the background of her snapchat/tumblr selfies and to throw parties, but at best would most likely be using him. Also House Noxus and House Ionia have never really got along, they just aren't fetch.

But that's just me! I love these comics Gutter Rat has been producing, and the Academy characters are for players to tell whatever stories they want with. I really hope we can do some more in the future. School is something most people can relate to, although this time I'd play up the conflict side more. They were supposed to be like Ikki Tousen or Rival Schools: Project Justice.

I think most artists pair them because they're the pretty ones who also engage in succubus-like activities. They hang out a lot in Academy Adventures and a few other artists seem to have taken the ship somewhere, but ofc it's just a superficial teenage thing.

IMO Ahri does not deserve our boy.

But thanks for the flavour, it was awesome :3
I agree so far no one in LoL is worthy of Vladimir!
